basics.name: Ally Featherstone
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer with experience working as a Salesforce engineer

education.area: MSc(Hons) Digital Technology Solutions Specialism (Software Engineering)

work.summary: In a Payments team, working Kanban, completing ticketed work across BAU and Tech Debt, as well as project work across large scale company initiatives. Working with PHP, Javascript, Java, Jenkins, Docker, Kafka, on a SDLC. Most recent projects include writing automation tests.

Working in an Agile team, completing ticketed work across a sprint. Using Jira and coding on the Salesforce Service Cloud platform. Pairing with and supporting Salesforce Administrators. Predominantly using Apex and Javascript, across LWC, Aura, and Jenkins deployments.

Studying an apprenticeship degree for 10% of the time while training to be a Salesforce engineer in the team for the other 90%. Completing theory and practical assignments based on my area of the business
